channel.title: Need More Neuts
channel.description: It is my opinion that the addition of one or two more true neutral classes....There is no Jester in the game...how can you have a medieval court game without a Jester.....So maybe a Jester Class....like the alchemist, have him be a boon or hindrance depending on who he aligns with. Another beneficial neut class would eliminate the "Neut Out" meme I think.

item.title: Need More Neuts
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
#NeutsIn ( neutral social)

Day ability 1
Free Ice Cream :Everyone gets free Ice Cream , unless you are lactose intolerant or otherwise don’t like Ice Cream , in that situation you get a cash equivalent prize . Yay .

Win condition : Survive the game !

Read full topic

item.title: Need More Neuts
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
I mean im all for more beneficial neuts.Or neuts that are hard to deal with.Right now even as confirmed alchemist prince will still exe you bc neuts out.For example,There is a good king,2 alchs,2 unseen,1 BD,
a scorned,and a possessor.(8 people and 2 Bds)
The king and some other people(I dont remember but they werent BD)hung me(The confirmed alch)bc #NEUTSOUT.This was gamethrowing technically.Having the 2 alchs + the scorns vote was the only way he would get someone on stand.But he hangs me loses the game for BD and all bc #NEUTSOUT.I think if there was a neut that good benefit either side would be good for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Need More Neuts
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
No, you’re fine. There are just other games like this with a role called the Jester that is basically the Fool.

item.title: Need More Neuts
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Adding a Jester as a Neutral Support or something and making it completely different from ToS’s Jester is an okay idea with me

Neutral Investigative are bad in general (see: ToS Witch)

item.description:
I think Alchemist could be evened out if it became convertible

item.title: Need More Neuts
item.dc:creator: LordThaezar
item.description:
Alchemist is so good. Staying Neutral, helping the majority. I definitely agree we could use a new Alchemist-Like class, just like Alchemist mixes a killer and a healer, it could be a mix of investigative class and something else. Neuts IN!

Read full topic

Neuts out theme is needed , neuts in theme is free win mode
